ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Dr. Simon Pollett for advice and review, all the individuals providing samples that were used in this study, Dr. Cinthya Cueva and other study personnel from Salud Comunitaria collecting the samples, and the Ecuadorean Ministry of Health.

sec.title: Disclaimer
sec.p: This material has been reviewed by the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research. There is no objection to its presentation and/or publication. The opinions or assertions contained herein are the private views of the author, and are not to be construed as official, or as reflecting true views of the Department of the Army or the Department of Defense.
